name: PCFW
body:
### Welcome
On this site you can follow the progress on Plug.dj Coding FrameWork (PCFW).

### What is Plug.dj Coding FrameWork?
PCFW is a framework that can be used to easily write powerful and featureful scripts for the music sharing website [plug.dj](http://plug.dj)

### Who is behind PCFW?
PCFW is currently being developed by @TATDK.
You may know him from [Plug.Pony](http://plugpony.net), [plugÂ³](http://tatdk.github.com/plugCubed/) and SweetieBOT from [the Friendship is Magic room](http://plug.dj/friendshipismagic/) on plug.dj.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
